ShortDescription.Value: Easy scale Public Transit, Industry Cargo and Delivery, and Road + Parks vehicles, and expand Transit Line slider limits.

Publish.LongDescription:
### Dispatch Boss
Adjust vehicle capacities and building fleet limits across **Transit**, **Industry**, and **Maintenance** — plus an optional toggle to expand the vanilla **transit line vehicle slider**.
### What it does - **Depots**: scale max vehicles per depot (Bus, Taxi, Tram, Train, Subway) - **Passengers**: scale seats per vehicle - **Industry Deliveries**: scale cargo capacity for delivery vehicles (Semi trucks, Delivery vans, Motorbike delivery, Raw materials trucks) - **Extractor + cargo fleet**: scale max fleet for extractor transport companies + cargo stations (harbor/train/airport cargo) - **Road + Park maintenance**: scale depot fleet size, work capacity, and work rate - **Road wear speed (alpha)**: scale how fast roads accumulate wear over time - **Transit line slider limits**: allows game's route line slider to reach **1 vehicle** on most routes and higher maximum vehicles.
### Notes 🚍🚋🚆✈️🚢 - **Sliders** adjust any time, no restart needed. - Supports switching cities. - Transit lines: expanded limits still follow the game’s **route cycle time** (travel time + stops); slider gets higher maximums, but still varies per line (due to game's formula). - Depot capacity = maximum number of vehicles a single depot can maintain or spawn (scales off base building, not extensions). - Remove other depot/passenger capacity mods to avoid conflicts (they override each other). - No Harmony patching; more compatible - less likely to break with game updates. - Safe to remove any time (use Reset buttons to return to vanilla values).
## 11 Languages
- English, Français, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, Italiano Italian - 한국어 Korean, 日本語 Japanese, 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese) - 繁體中文 Traditional Chinese, Português Brazilian, Polski Polish
### Credits - River-Mochi: author and maintainer - yenyang: code review and technical advice - Inspired by Wayz's original Depot Capacity Changer. - Necko1996: testing - BugsyG: testing - StarQ for technical advice
